text: Vhisvakarma or Vhisvakarman in the deity hindu early text vhisvakarma was original According to some part the legend when samjna any powerful deity. However, in many later traditions, Vishvakarma became the name of the craftsman god. Vhisvakarma crafted all of the chartiots the devas and weapons Vishvakarma was real the real God Vishvakarma The therm Vishvakarma Hinduism Category:Hindu gods and goddesses
title: Vishvakarma
